fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, plan to host a firework show. (3 uses)
- If you hosted a firework show, choose a player to launch a firework towards.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the night, Town is alerted of the firework show and each player may choose to watch it for the night.
- Players that watch it may not use their night abilities and are granted Powerful Defense for the night.
- You may not watch your own show.
- Players that do not choose will automatically choose to not watch the show.
- If you launch a firework at a player watching the show, they are dealt an Unstoppable Attack. If you launch a firework at a player who chose to not watch, they will instead be roleblocked.
